full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,

We've realised the wrong file was provided to you. Please remove this tile and I will re-send the correct file.

Apologies for the mucking about.

Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/

Hi Nikki,

Confirming that we have replaced the file. 

Here's the link:
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/roger/

Let us know if you would like further changes

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia changed the customer to Nikki Ozeken
